Posts.Title: neuropathy lucydog lucydog

Posts.Content: lucydog wrote: Hello:  I have  neuropathy  with numbness/burning and decreasing motor  strength in my  lower  legs going on 2-3 months. Because  I have  widespread  bone  mets and  a  new  cancer  in my  right  breast and a slowly but steadily increasing tumor  marker, my  oncologist thinks  I may  have  spread  to the  meninges in my  spine. An MRI of my  complete  spine  didn't show  any  tumor  or  disc or  anything obvious that  could be  causing the  symptoms.  I just started on neurontin about  10 days ago, it  helps with the  pain, but  I am having significant  swelling in my  lower  legs from it. Anyone  else  experience  this ? Any  suggestions ?  I have  refused an LP because  I will not  do chemo in my  spinal fluid. " Quality  of life" as  they  say.  I was  orginally dx with Stg II breast  cancer, ER+, PR+ in 1995, had  mastectomy, chemp, then tamoxifen for  5 yrs. Dx with mets 2007. Trying to stay  alive  anothr 3 years to get  my  last  kid thru college. Currently on Faslodex after  Femara failed, may  go to Taxitere in the  next  few months.  Thanks. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: neuropathy lucydog lucydog
